description: Determine whether an integer is a palindrome.

testCases.name: Example 1
testCases.description: A number that reads the same backward as forward.

testCases.name: Example 2
testCases.description: A negative number is not a palindrome.

testCases.name: Boundary Condition 1
testCases.description: A single digit number that is not a palindrome.

testCases.name: Stress Test
testCases.description: A large positive integer that is not a palindrome.
